name.ja: <ruby>錬<rt>れん</rt></ruby><ruby>金<rt>きん</rt></ruby><ruby>釜<rt>がま</rt></ruby>－カオス・ディスティル

text.en:
Any card sent to your GY is banished instead. You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Add 1 "Macro Cosmos", or 1 card that mentions it, from your Deck to your hand, except "Chaos Distill".
● If "Macro Cosmos" is on the field: Banish this face-up card from the Spell & Trap Zone; add 1 LIGHT monster with ? ATK from your Deck to your hand.
You can only use this effect of "Chaos Distill" once per turn.
